SaleItemsMens.name: LOU SLIM - RAW SELVEDGE
SaleItemsMens.description: Made from 12.5 oz narrow loom Japanese Selvedge and superfluous dark indigo dye, the Raw Selvedge is a 21st Century jean that pays homage to the origins of denim. The Raw Selvedge denim is perfectly showcased in our slim straight Lou fit, which was inspired by the jeans that Lou Reed wore while recording Velvet Underground’s eponymous LP in 1966.

SaleItemsMens.name: IGGY SKINNY - PERFECTO
SaleItemsMens.description: Based on the style worn by the Godfather of Punk himself, the Iggy Skinny is a regular waist and slim leg skinny inspired by the iconic era of rock and roll. With a comfort stretch and yarn dyed black warp and weft, the Iggy Skinny - Perfecto is a no-nonsense, hard-wearing and incredibly comfortable black jean. We’re sure it will become your favourite pair.

SaleItemsMens.name: NOISE TEE - TEENAGE RIOT
SaleItemsMens.description: The Noise Tee is a regular fit crew tee, crafted with quality sub textured cotton for comfortable, relaxed silhouette. It features our signature grin stitch and seasonal "Teenage Riot" graphic printed on the front.

SaleItemsMens.name: UNITY TEE - NAVY LINEN STRIPE
SaleItemsMens.description: The Unity Tee combines the natural characters of cotton and linen with a patterned navy stripe. This classic tee features a regular fitting silhouette and crew neckline with capped sleeves. Try it partnered with your favourite denim wash with white trainers.

SaleItemsMens.name: TYPE ONE JACKET - BEATEN INDIGO
SaleItemsMens.description: The Type One Jacket in Beaten Indigo features a slim fitting silhouette in premium indigo fabric. It's stone-washed appearance gives it that worn-in look with distressed detailing throughout. Silver metal hardware and button up front with front and side pockets.

SaleItemsMens.name: RIDER JACKET - BLACK LEATHER
SaleItemsMens.description: A black leather jacket is one of the most timeless wardrobe essentials around and the Rider Jacket in black leather is famed for it's high quality rider style and statement antique silver zips. Crafted from premium Arabian lamb leather the rider has a zip front closure, pointed collar and side pockets with minimal styling.

SaleItemsWomens.name: MARILYN SKINNY - BLUE BUST
SaleItemsWomens.description: As the affinity for skinny-leg jeans continues, invest in the Marilyn Skinny, our iconic high waisted jean with a skinny, tapered leg profile that was inspired by Marilyn Monroe. Blue Bust features premium European fabric with a beautiful mid blue wash with ripped kneehole destruction and raw detailing for an edgy finish.

SaleItemsWomens.name: BOWERY SKINNY - TRUE BLACK
SaleItemsWomens.description: The Bowery Skinny is our mid rise skinny jean, crafted in a premium European stretch fabric with high stretch and retention the Bowery in true black features stay black technology for a longer, richer wash. Wear them paired back with a tee or a tucked in blouse and box-fresh trainers for an effortless approach.

SaleItemsWomens.name: LOVE ME TEE
SaleItemsWomens.description: Crafted in luxurious linen the Love me Tee features a comfortable, relaxed fit perfect for day-to-day wear. Featuring custom embroidered detailing at neck and capped sleeves.

SaleItemsWomens.name: PANEL TEE
SaleItemsWomens.description: Crafted from a cotton blend the Panel Tee features front and back panels and a self bound neck. Perfect for day-to-day wear, simply add your favourite denim wash and white trainers for an effortless approach.

SaleItemsWomens.name: MADEN JACKET - BEATEN BLUE
SaleItemsWomens.description: Maden Jacket in Beaten Blue exudes understated cool with distressing detail for a raw finish. It's crafted to a loose shape and features a button-up-front with chest pockets and is framed with a classic point collar. Wear yours with a white tee and your favourite denim wash to mirror the understated aesthetic.

SaleItemsWomens.name: ISABEL JACKET - CHARCOAL
SaleItemsWomens.description: The Isabel Jacket presents an oversized, tailored silhouette with subtle feminine undertones. It's crafted from a textured wool blend fabric with outside front welt pockets, front button closure, a fully lined interior and is framed with a classic V neckline. Team it with any denim wash and a white tee for head-to-toe impact.

JeanFits.name: BOWERY
JeanFits.description: Bowery is our mid rise skinny jean and a flattering twist on the standard skinny jean. Pair this jean with a tee and box-fresh trainers or boots for an effortless day-to-day look.

JeanFits.name: SMITH
JeanFits.description: Our classic high skinny jean. Fit as just as tight as on the mid rised Bowery. For you who prefer a higher rise and still like a skinny silhouette.

JeanFits.name: MARILYN
JeanFits.description: With a 27cm rise and tapered skinny leg, the Marilyn is our iconic super high-waisted skinny fit. Inspired by Marilyn Monroe.

JeanFits.name: LEXI
JeanFits.description: If you like it fitted and not too tight - Lexi is the fit for you. Lexi are a high waisted jean with a straight leg. A jeans classic.

JeanFits.name: LOLA
JeanFits.description: Our high rised mom-jean. The loose and tapered leg offering a relaxed silhouette and a modern look. Wear these with ease together with a white tee and a low top sneaker or a minimalistic ballerina shoe.

JeanFits.name: REBEL
JeanFits.description: With a relaxed, longer rise and super skinny tapered leg, this is the ultimate fit for 21st century rebels. A nod to the rockers of the Scandinavian Underground metal scene. Rebel is designed to fit perfectly whether worn low or high.

JeanFits.name: IGGY
JeanFits.description: This is our global bestseller. A modern and skinny fit featured with tapered legs. Match your Iggy’s with a pair of black boots or white sneakers. Fit inspired by the jean Iggy Pop wore on the cover of the album ’The idiot’.

JeanFits.name: LOU
JeanFits.description: Lou are a classic 5-pocket jean in  a regular fit. Fit are not too tight, not too loose and are a bit tapered from leg down to the ankle. Our everyday jean that can be worn with whatever whenever.

JeanFits.name: SERGE
JeanFits.description: For spring 18 we’re introducing a new, straight fit with slightly tapered legs called Serge. Perfect if you’re looking to replace your skinny jeans with a straight classic. Match these jeans together with a pair of sneakers and you’re good to go.

JeanFits.name: STUDIO
JeanFits.description: A relaxed fit with cropped legs. If you’re looking for something else than skinny jeans we suggest that you’ll try this. It’s something else.
